title: Wiki
cannotMoveBetweenTypes: Cannot move between personal and company knowledge
selectEntry: Select an entry to view or edit
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this entry? All child entries will also be deleted.
moveHint: The entry will be moved to the selected location and the tree will be automatically sorted alphabetically.
dropHereForRoot: Drop here to move to root level
linkCopyErrorDetail: Failed to copy link to clipboard
digitalTwinSetDetail: This entry is now set as Digital Twin entry point
digitalTwinRemovedDetail: This entry is no longer set as Digital Twin entry point

noContentDetail: The protocol has no content to process
protocolAppliedDetail: {facts} facts processed. {updated} categories updated, {new} new categories created.
protocolApplyErrorDetail: Failed to apply protocol to digital twin
smartEditDescription: Describe your changes or record them using voice input. The AI will analyze and suggest precise edits.

SmartEdit.title: Smart Edit
SmartEdit.inputPlaceholder: Describe the changes you want to make, e.g., 'Update contact person to Max Mustermann'
